Package uk.me.berndporr.iirj

Class SOSCascade

java.lang.Object
uk.me.berndporr.iirj.Cascade
uk.me.berndporr.iirj.SOSCascade
public class SOSCascade extends Cascade
User facing class which contains two methods to create Custom SOS filters, in particular where the filter coefficients have been generated by Python's scipy signal library for example: sos = signal.butter(4, 0.1, output='sos'). Call one of the setup() methods below to set the SOS coefficients. See the unit test for examples how to set the coefficients.

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup(double[][] sosCoefficients, int directFormType)
      Sets directly the coefficients of the chain of 2nd order filters. The layout of the array is excatly how the scipy python design functions output the sos coeffcients: [b0,b1,b2,a0,a1,a2],[b0,b1,b2,a0,a1,a2],... The filter type can be either DirectFormAbstract.DIRECT_FORM_II or DirectFormAbstract.DIRECT_FORM_I.
      Parameters:
      sosCoefficients - SOS coefficients
      directFormType - Direct form type (I or II).

    • setup

      public void setup(double[][] sosCoefficients)
      Sets directly the coefficients of the chain of 2nd order filters. The layout of the array is excatly how the scipy python design functions output the coeffcients: [b0,b1,b2,a0,a1,a2],[b0,b1,b2,a0,a1,a2],... The filter type is DIRECT_FORM_II.
      Parameters:
      sosCoefficients - SOS coefficients
